title: Can't share Google Maps location link with contact
content:
Hey guys! 

I had a quick search but couldn't find any similar posts - is this a known bug? 

When I'm in Google Maps and try to share a link for a location, no contacts or apps are selectable after clicking Share. 

You cannot slide the tray to see more contacts or apps, you cannot click to select, you can only close the pop-up using the X or going back to close. 

I previously had a Pixel 3 and this worked fine, but have since experienced when moving to the Pixel 4.

Any help appreciated as it's a very annoying bug! 

Thanks. 

Note: I've deleted the email contacts in the screenshot below for privacy, but these are displaying fine on my phone.
